with open(''main.py'', ''r'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    lines = f.readlines()

# Keep lines 0 to 5077 (line 5078 is index 5077)
# Skip lines 5078 to 5552 (indices 5077 to 5551)  
# Keep lines from 5553 onwards (index 5552 onwards)

new_lines = lines[:5077] + lines[5552:]

with open(''main.py'', ''w'', encoding=''utf-8'') as f:
    f.writelines(new_lines)

print(f''Removed lines 5078-5552 ({5552-5077} lines)'')
